items.sentence: It\'s easy to see why people don\'t trust Tom.
I have a friend coming over to visit tomorrow.
I have to deliver this package to Tom Jackson.
Tom couldn\'t understand what Mary was saying.
I bought a backpack at the army surplus store.
I bought a bottle of beer at the liquor store.
I bought an eight-acre farm for my retirement.
Tom was only one of Mary\'s many stepchildren.
Tom had never spoken to Mary before that time.
Tom had never yelled at Mary like that before.
